website_summaries.verdict: This is an impressive pillow that provides back support and comfort while reading in bed and is easy to use.
pros: Great for both reading and relaxing in bed while also useful for comfortable sleeping positioning
Comes with a zip-around, washable cover for added convenience and comfort
Firmness is just enough for sitting up while not feeling too rigid
cons: Entire pillow is too large to fit in the washing machine

customer_reviews.title: time will tell
customer_reviews.text: 3 other wedges I tried went FLAT when you put your head and shoulders on them.......WHAT'S THE POINT.......this wedge stayed a wedge and did not go flat. EXACTLY what I was looking for to help with my sinus problems. Time will tell if it lasts, but as of now very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. William D. Kern Jr.

customer_reviews.title: LIFE CHANGING!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife got me this pillow, which actually helps with my mild sleep apnea. No more train engine snoring and I wake up rested each morning. You just need to put a little pillow to support your head and you're good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Francee L. Mulero

customer_reviews.title: Sitting upright is all Right.
customer_reviews.text: Sitting in the bed can be luxurious. Unless, you are sliding down or pillows are going between the mattress and the bed. These pillows elevated me enough to comfortably knit for hours and kept any pillows from their normal disappearing act. Yeah.
customer_reviews.author: Williamettia Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great help post lumpectomy surgery
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to help me relax and sleep following a lumpectomy and sentinel node removal. Perfect size and just enough elevation to make getting in and out of bed less tortuous, and relaxing and sleeping in bed as comfortable as possible. I placed a pillow on top of the wedge, under my head, for the best elevation for my needs. No smell on removal from packing plastic and it almost immediately reached the perfect level of firmness. Three weeks post surgery, still using it with positive results.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: This one is just right!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow to improve my sleep. My husband told me that I snore sometimes and that my breathing seems to stop occasionally (possibly sleep apnea). Since I have been sleeping (at first with extra pillows and now with this wedge) neither sleep issues has occurred. I selected the wedge that is 10"high and it is great! I really like the soft cover that can be zipped off and the foam does not seem to heat up. The support is just right, neither too firm nor too soft. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jill d. Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for reading in bed
customer_reviews.text: I needed this because my neck was hurting from trying to read in bed with just a pillow to prop me up. This is perfect. I'm also going to use it to sleep elevated when I have facial work done in a few weeks to alleviate the swelling post-procedure. And I'm having leg issues from running so I can use it to elevate my legs and feet too. So I guess this is ideal for an active woman who is trying to stave off the aging process for at least a little while longer!
customer_reviews.author: LoneStarBroker

customer_reviews.title: Height isn't as advertised!!!! Buyer beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: When I got the product I opened it up right away so it could expand and air. I didn't use it for a few weeks due to travel. Went to measure the pillow before I put the cover on and it was 8.75 inches instead of 10 inches. Messaged them and they basically told me to screw off or return it. You don't get what you paid for and their customer service is horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Dookie Dook

customer_reviews.title: This is the bomb so I'm told.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered to help with my snoring. So far my I have only been able to open it. My wife loves it so much that I haven't gotten to use it. It's a lot like when I order fries at a restaurant and she doesn't want any and eats half of mine. Only this time she took it all. On a positive note she still isn't snoring at night. I'm afraid if I order another she will need it to prop up her feet. Not all husbands wear capes.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and zero odor!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived sooner than expected in perfect condition. Zero odor or any smell at all (including no foam smell). 10” seems a perfect height. Not too tall, yet higher than just stacking up a couple of pillows under your head. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Great wedge
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time in perfect condition. Exactly as pictured-described. I got the 10 inch. I didn't buy this for health problems, I bought it so I can lie comfortably in bed and read or watch TV, or sit in bed and knit or crochet etc. It's firmness makes it perfect for these things. Also there is no chemical smell, or any bad smells at all in this wedge. I really love that it comes with a zippered, washable cover. I would definitely buy this again and definitely recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: ClareDeLune

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than described
customer_reviews.text: Got it, opened it, it expanded but didn't match the dimensions in the description. Wrong size by inches:( seller took item back but it was a pain to get back in the box
customer_reviews.author: tim smith

customer_reviews.title: SURGERY PILLOW
customer_reviews.text: Purchased pillow for use after surgery as it was suggested to keep head elevated. Originally i wanted the 7in thinking the 10inch would have been too much, but after having the chance to use it, im very happy that i got the 10in instead. I loved that it came vacuumed sealed as well. It was easy to transport until i was ready to use. Pillow comes with cover. Overall very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Very well made !
customer_reviews.text: I have other memory foam pillows , this 10 inch wedge now goes under them . I have GERD and many digestive issues. I need to sleep almost sitting up in bed . This helps a lot . Very soft and comfortable bamboo cover that you can zip off to wash . Good Buy !
customer_reviews.author: Rozy288

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bed Wedge/Pillow; Great Design
customer_reviews.text: Shopping for bed pillows that are hypoallergenic and/or have a zippered cover is nearly an impossible task. That is, until I found these. Bought two, one for me, and one for my hubby. Very versatile, as you can position it different ways depending on your needs. Could also be used as a wedge under a traditional mattress to bring your head up a bit higher. I love the fact that it comes with a zippered cover as that has been very helpful in fighting my dust mite allergy.
customer_reviews.author: Kallicat69

customer_reviews.title: Nice Wedge Pillow & Comfortable Cover
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow to elevate my torso while sleeping due to acid reflux. First I used it to sit up in bed to watch tv and it's great. After sleeping with it for a couple hours I woke up with a sore neck. I switched positions and woke again in a few hours with a sore neck. We'll find good uses for this pilow but sleeping an entire night won't be one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lisa

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BELIEVE WHAT THE LOW STARS SAY!
customer_reviews.text: This is polyester foam, not memory foam, thus it has nice "give" and is still firm and comfortable. I use a soft thin pillow. I do NOT slip down, because the cover is not slick but provides good "grip". I have an adjustable bed at home for elevation and I use this for travelling and works well enough for me to get a good night's sleep. I am buying another one for my wife right now! Perfect for sleeping without GIRD! I have had NO PROBLEM with the zipper.
customer_reviews.author: M. Schaeffer

customer_reviews.title: Angles, Angles and more Angles!!!
customer_reviews.text: Idk what other people use this pillow for... But I purchased it for the single best function in our bedroom to assist with our sex life. It definitely should be said that I think this is a must-have in our bedroom... Only 2nd to our restraints and lubricant. Definitely would buy again if it ever needs to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Robin S

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive snoring help
customer_reviews.text: Just started using the 10' wedge pillow to curb my snoring. Highly recommended by my chiropractor I'm adjusting from a side sleeper to a sleeping om my back. By using the wedge the tongue can't drop blocking my airway therefore reduced snoring. I feel refreshed in the morning
customer_reviews.author: The Ruffian

customer_reviews.title: Try sleeping over a rock instead
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to get used to sleep on my back, so I needed something to start with this and also to avoid waking up with puffy eyes. The pillow has a good quality but it’s hard as a rock, so if you sleep on it you will feel like you are trying to sleep over a ramp. Not comfortable at all
customer_reviews.author: ALomeli

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I bought this so I could breathe better when I sleep (I use it as a head pillow- weird but the elevation helps me sleep when I'm sick with coughs.) It's SUPER comfy, firm, nice and soft material. It came rolled up and unrolled perfectly. The price is a steal- this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jax

customer_reviews.title: Works as Expected
customer_reviews.text: Needed a wedge pillow so that I could sit up in bed and read. Much too large for me to sleep with it, but it works well to sit up in bed with - great back support. Not sure how to wash this in the washing machine though, and that is why it isn't 5 stars. Comes rolled up and easily unfolds and takes shape into the wedge. Unsure if I were to return it how easily it would roll back up.
customer_reviews.author: Ana P.

customer_reviews.title: make sure you measure the incline you want...
customer_reviews.text: Got the 10" Waaay more incline than I needed so I may purchase the smaller in future but for now I will occasionally use the wedge for reflux but sleep further down so that I am not so high up on it. It's great for reading or watching TV though.
customer_reviews.author: D in NC

customer_reviews.title: Nicely firm and much higher quality than those sold in local retail stores.
customer_reviews.text: Foam wedge arrived tightly rolled up and vacuum sealed in a long rectangular box. It unrolled nicely and there was no off-smell. The cover is nice - not the most elegant but not cheaply thin. Really appreciated the generous dimensions -- much more pillow than the small, thin versions sold at local retailer. Husband found the angle too sharp for elevating his leg but it works beautifully as a backdrop for our pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom

customer_reviews.title: No back pain and good posture while in bed
customer_reviews.text: I love that it's firm and bamboo, easy zipper to clean the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Oros

customer_reviews.title: Relax in comfort
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy sitting in bed watching television, crocheting, coloring, you name it. My bed is my go-to. My wedge provides comfort to my back and neck by supporting my body and allowing me to recline whilst I’m sitting in my bed. No more uncomfortable positions to do crafts and puzzles. No more crooks in my neck. My cats love it too. I’m looking to purchase a bigger wedge in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Claudette G.

customer_reviews.title: Yes.
customer_reviews.text: My wife made fun of me for buying this yet I always find that she hijacks it before I get in bed. Must mean it’s nice. I got the 10” primarily for reading in bed. Two pillows up top and this thing and you won’t wake up with a sore back from reading in bed. Also great for other bed purposes that don’t need any details.... 😏
customer_reviews.author: Merritt Harris

customer_reviews.title: It is helping to make me more comfortable during my recovery
customer_reviews.text: Currently recovering from surgery to repair tears in my left shoulder rotator cuff, and I'm so thankful that I found this product. It is helping to make me more comfortable during my recovery. After recovery, I intend on using this wedge to aid in my efforts to continue reading in bed at night before I fall asleep...a habit I developed as a child. Thank you so very much!
customer_reviews.author: Mary N.

customer_reviews.title: Firm, but helpful for back sleeping
customer_reviews.text: I have been training myself to sleep on my back and this is helping to do so without as much back pain. I still can't quite get through the night and need to push it off to the side in the wee morning hours, but I think I"ll eventually get there. It takes time to adjust and get used to it. The foam is a bit hard, but with some pillows on top, it's doable. I suppose the firmness of the foam is necessary for longevity. Being able to wash the cover is nice. I hope it holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Saliandra

customer_reviews.title: Yikes
customer_reviews.text: This is made of hard foam and I also think I am allergic to it. Edit: I am VERY allergic to it. I touch it and get itchy dots all over my body.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Wagster

customer_reviews.title: Unless you like the feel of laying on concrete
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to using this product, but it was so hard I couldn't lay on it for 5 minutes. I was expecting it to at least mold somewhat to fit my body. Unless you like the feel of laying on concrete, be careful about ordering this product. I did return mine and received very quick credit (I love Amazon). The return shipping was free, but since it would no way roll up to fit in original packaging, I had to spend $20 for new packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Holt

customer_reviews.title: Wedge pillow
customer_reviews.text: This pillow was very comfortable. I had rotator cuff surgery 2 weeks ago and have been sleeping in a recliner since. Someone brought this to my attention. I decided to try it and I'm so glad I did. It really helps and doesn't require me having to use all the bed pillows around me which just shift all over anyway and dont give the support the wedge does. The 10" incline is perfect for me. The bamboo cover had a slight odor but I sprayed with a little febreze and it was gone. It is washable too but I was just anxious to use that night.
customer_reviews.author: Darrit

customer_reviews.title: A good body positioner
customer_reviews.text: I am a pretty large guy, and I liked the width of this slanted pillow. I was using a stack of pillows, but it was always lumpy, and when I had it just right, it was time to change the linens and I had a lumpy mess again. And my pillow stack never seemed wide enough. Now, I only use a couple of pillows, and am comfortable, even after a change of linens. I think I am going to order a slightly thinner version, because this wedge is perhaps too high. This is probably why I down-rated it one star.
customer_reviews.author: D. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Badly needed pillow could not be more disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I’m extremely disappointed in the quality of this pillow, especially considering the price. There is nothing to retain the shape on the narrow end. The fabric covering the pillow is just nasty feeling. I really need this pillow for a medical condition. I have a limited income. I feel like you should be ashamed to sell this product.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my husband to put under his pillow ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband to put under his pillow to elevate his head. The 10" was a little big so he cut it down some because he would slip down. He can, at least, sleep in bed most of the night rather than in his recliner. The elevated aspect of this wedge makes it easier for him to breathe. He has allergies and sinus problems.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke within a few uses
customer_reviews.text: Had this less than a month, only used it 2-3x a week and the zipper broke. I paid too much for this to fall apart so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Bee Designs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful wedge pillow! I ordered this wedge pillow to keep my head elevated after skin surgery on my face. I was told that there would probably be a lot of swelling and possibly a black eye. After using ice and this pillow, there was very minimal swelling and absolutely no black eye! Needless to say, I am extremely happy with this product. I continue to use it to prop myself up when reading in bed. Great company, great product! Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: cj hart

customer_reviews.title: Game changer for watching TV in bed!
customer_reviews.text: I like to sit up and watch TV in bed sometimes, but my triple pillow setup was starting to take its toll on my back. This pillow has completely changed that. I'm sure that I could watch TV in bed for a long time with this pillow, though I usually wind up going to bed after an episode or two. I have tried to sleep with it, but I haven't found it very comfortable to do that with because I am a side sleeper. Totally worth it for the purpose that I bought it for, though!
customer_reviews.author: Magical Selan

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't Order Again
customer_reviews.text: The pillow was received quickly in a compressed state. It expanded to advertised size. I don't like that the insert is made of cheap, foam and has a strong, chemical smell that hasn't dissipated completely. The cover is sewn well but fabric seems like a cheap poly, not bamboo. It's a little stiff to sleep on. I think the product is overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Lori S

customer_reviews.title: Too firm
customer_reviews.text: This seems very well made compared to other foam pillows I've looked at. It had a very minimal odor and I'm very sensitive. My acid reflux is significantly better using this pillow and I've also noticed my sinuses are clearer upon waking. It is extremely firm, much too firm for me and I didn't know that was possible. I've slept on it for a couple of weeks thinking my body just needed to adjust to it and continue to wakeup with backpain and a headache. So this isn't the pillow for me and I'll continue my search.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect height, but extremely firm!
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Perfect height for elevating head without neck pain. Generous size. Washable cover. Great for reading in bed (when turned on side like in picture). CONS: Very firm, so an additional pillow is needed to cushion head, which adds to the height. * I'm still getting used to it. Bought it to elevate head (to reduce eye puffiness) and reduce wrinkles on side of face and chest area from sleeping on my side. I wish it were made of memory foam so it wasn't so hard on the back of my head.
customer_reviews.author: amiller

customer_reviews.title: Best thing for acid reflux/ulcer issue, but wait! There’s more!
customer_reviews.text: How have I lived without this pillow! It’s changed my life and I’m not being silly here! LOVE this pillow! Not only has it increased the resolution of my acid reflux, but it’s also resolved sinus congestion and just general discomfort in my neck and shoulders as I sleep. I didn’t know how badly I needed this pillow until I bought it! It didn’t come wit a pillowcase, so now I am looking for one, either I’ll find one made or just figure out how to make one myself, small problem for such a fantastic pillow!
customer_reviews.author: Billie

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS YESTERDAY
customer_reviews.text: THESE HAVE CHANGED OUR LIVES! Originally bought for head, back, and knee support after abdominal surgery. Worked well for staying comfortable in bed for a week, but way more importantly this has CURED my husband’s incessant and loud snoring!! He sleeps on it regularly and I am finally sleeping through the night not being woken up by his snarling! lol! I am also now sleeping on my back which has cured my hip pain (side sleeping is the worrrrrst) Thank you, Brentwood!!!
customer_reviews.author: NikkiD

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The pillow was very hard. The cover zipper broke in 10 days and I was not allowed to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim G

customer_reviews.title: Hate it.
customer_reviews.text: Awkward. I only kept as I had no idea as to how to return. It is huge uncomfortable awkward and totally useless and it’s like a long narrow sliver so not sure who thought how it might even remotely be useful.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Berkmen

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, helps with GERD
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pillow to help treat my husband's GERD. This pillow is very comfortable and had helped to dramatically reduce his acid reflux symptoms. We are going to buy another one. We got the 10" and it's the perfect height.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Comfotable, but The 10 inch is pretty tall to sleep all night on.
customer_reviews.text: This really helped my Acid Reflux and helps me fall asleep. The only downside is that I ordered the 10 inch and it's great for sitting in bed while reading or watching TV, and even taking a nap, but its a little too high to sleep on through the night, so I wake up and have to remove it. Not a big problem, but if you plan to sleep all night on it, get the shorter one, because with your pillow on top of it, it's pretty high.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre L DuPee Jr

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could easily sit up in bed and watch TV, lots of reviews mentioned that it was hard, and not soft, it is definitely a little bit harder, but that is good for me as my back doesn't sink into an uncomfortable position.
customer_reviews.author: E.K.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I am having rotator cuff surgery next week and I purchased this pillow for after surgery but thought it would be beneficial if I learned how to sleep on prior to surgery. I was pleasantly surprised to discover my pain has been greatly reduced (even before surgery) because I am not roll over on my bad shoulder. I LOVE this wedge pillow!
customer_reviews.author: E. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Too short in length
customer_reviews.text: I think this could be a decent product but it is WAY too short for me. I’m 5’10” for reference, and if the pillow is properly aligned at my lower back, my head is WAY off the top of the pillow. This renders it useless, since positioning the pillow back further to support my head leaves me with a lower spine curvature that will cause serious pain eventually. Trying to figure out a return right now — the way it’s packaged does not make it easy. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Ed H.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Expected
customer_reviews.text: I need a wedge to sleep on when I recover from surgery and this was a great price plus the reviews seemed decent. It comes wrapped in a tube and compressed. Just make sure you carefully open it. I had a friend help me rip the plastic as I carefully snipped the plastic wrap with scissors. It took overnight for it to fully expand. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: P.C.

customer_reviews.title: SUPER DUO!!!
customer_reviews.text: made well packaging was fun :( BUT WAS GREAT TO PROTECT ITEM....then like magic, it pops open....it was fun. Well made , perfect dimensions. I got it to elevate my legs/feet AND I can read in bed with good back & neck support !! Thanks for making a great product....I could have just bought an inexpensive wedge, but my health is important due to inguries..... This will last longer than I will :) :) Like Bilbo Baggins I will be able to say " It's about as old as I am"
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Von Tepperoff

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow even better doggie ramp
customer_reviews.text: Bought this wedge for post surgery. It is very supportive and firm. BUT it is AMAZING as a little dog ramp!!! I have a low profile bed but it is still difficult for my 16 year old shih tzu to jump. He won’t use puppy steps to go down so I added the wedge and he used it immediately! I highly recommend this pillow! Also cover is easy to remove and wash :)
customer_reviews.author: Hdaysdca

customer_reviews.title: Aaaaahhh we found the solution.... So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I like to read, watch TV or play video games in bed. We were tired of slumping against the wall, but this was perfect!!! High quality pillow, very supportive and yet just soft enough. And no slipping on the pillowcase. We liked it so much we ordered another!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Wagner

customer_reviews.title: A god-send after rotator cuff surgery
customer_reviews.text: My sister had a massive surgical repair on her rotator cuff and had to sleep upright. Not easy. This helped a lot with assorted pillows and an ice cooler machine.
customer_reviews.author: southernbugg

customer_reviews.title: Regret This Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased to help with nighttime reflux and 100% regret buying this pillow. The wedge height is about 9 inches and it's horrible to sleep on because I slide down the pillow. Because it's so firm, it requires a pillow, which not only exacerbates the sliding problem, it also contributes to a sore neck. Finally, the length of the pillow that rests flat on the bed is too short to provide adequate back support. If you're looking for a wedge pillow, note it's really important to pay attention to the dimensions as it relates to your body size.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: won't reccomend
customer_reviews.text: Dislike the strong smell from the material. That need to be fixed. Had to hand wash it to get the smell off. waste of my time.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Very stiff and not comfortable at all. Has a smell when opened but seems to dissipate.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Pearson

customer_reviews.title: chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: I decided to order this pillow due to my side sleeping. The delivery was fast and product was received as in the picture. However, when I opened the package the pillow had a toxic smell. I decided to air it out by using a fan directly into the pillow. I have been using the pillow since 12/30 now today 4 days after received the pillow still smell like toxic fumes. I assumed due to the packaging it smell this way or that by being air out the chemical scent would disappear. Brentwood Home it is normal for your pillows to smell like chemical? Is this safe to keep around? Is it replaceable?
customer_reviews.author: gissell

customer_reviews.title: Great for a stuffy sinus
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help keep my sinuses open while I sleep during allergy season. This was a great investment- I am sleeping more soundly and dont wake up feeling like my head is full of cotton! If I could redo this purchase, I would have selected the 7" instead of the 10". The 10 is a little too steep for daily use but I've made it work. The cover is also a nice feature. I washed it per the directions and it didnt shrink or lose its softness. This is a good product, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Miller

customer_reviews.title: Just Right
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for use while recovering from a septo/rhinoplasty. Firm but comfortable, nice removable case. Haven’t washed case yet so can’t speak to its durability or how easily it goes back on
customer_reviews.author: Kelly P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Comfort For Sleep
customer_reviews.text: I use this wedge for sleeping and I can’t believe how good I have slept on it! I’m actually getting REM sleep where I have not been able to for many months now. If necessary, I will write additional information in a month or so.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. Gates

customer_reviews.title: make sure you know which incline you want
customer_reviews.text: I got the 12' incline on a someone's recommendation but cannot get comfortable using it. however it is very good quality and will undoubtedly last forever. i'm going to give away the one I bought and purchase a lesser incline.
customer_reviews.author: ChicagoGal

customer_reviews.title: It works and is of good quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it for my wife who's struggling with reflux. She's only used it for a couple of days and she is happy with the results so far.
customer_reviews.author: F. Villaman

customer_reviews.title: Need 1 for each person in household, it's that good
customer_reviews.text: I had a smaller wedge pillow my girlfriend and I fought over, so I got this while it was on sale--now my girlfriend gets jealous of this one and asks to use it regularly lol. We don't have a couch, only a bed without a headboard, but when I sit up with this pillow between my back and the wall, it's better than any couch. My gf is now asking to buy another one for her too
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Park

customer_reviews.title: PAIN IN THE NECK
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so stiff and hard it gives you a neck and headache right away. I think if it was lower and just a bit softer it might do the trick. I give it three stars because it is good for reading a book or sitting up in your bed but, not good for sleeping...EVER! I almost had to make a trip to the chiropractor because my neck was so stiff after using this. I read in another review that you have to try to get past this but, I've used it a lot and it has not.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it for shoulder surgery
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to sleep on after rotator cuff surgery and it was worth every penny. Surgery is never fun, but getting a good night’s sleep makes it so much easier. I never had to sleep in a recliner with this wedge. Now that my arm is out of the sling, I love putting the wedge vertical and leaning against it to read or use my tablet in bed. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Hard to the touch
customer_reviews.text: I gave this a try it's just too hard extremely uncomfortable. I didn't realize it was extra firm that's an understatement.
customer_reviews.author: redoak women

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pillow that can be used three ways! Better than the other reading-in-bed options I've found and I love the memory foam. Good price -- quality is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Neubauer

customer_reviews.title: Helps breathing
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband to help his breathing at night. It works and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Hubby and I both benefit from these!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were both snoring and having reflux problems, so after some research, I gave these a try. I bought two, and they arrived quickly and in perfect, brand new condition. We BOTH stopped snoring the first night, and last night was a glorious repeat of silence and recuperatIve sleep. I'll update if there's any bad news about durability.
customer_reviews.author: Aria

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well, and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Needed this for reading in bed. Works pretty well, and good quality. No off gassing. I bought the 10" --the 7" might have worked a little better but I am very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Nauseatingly Nautical

customer_reviews.title: A great way to be comfortable while you enjoy watching television
customer_reviews.text: it's hard for me to judge their ability since I just received the product but overall it seems pretty solid. Ask for cleaning the pillow it does have a removable outer cover that should be machine washable. I used the pillow last night and it held me up like a chance. I can't wait to waste more of my life watching TV on my bed
customer_reviews.author: Shea

customer_reviews.title: No more Reflux!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow only because I have really bad acid reflux and sometimes I wake up choking. I've been using this pillow for about 2 months now and I haven't had any reflux since! I do put a regular, semi-flat pillow on top of this pillow to help with softness. I have slept so good since buying this pillow and have taken it on two trips with me! I ain't going anywhere without this pillow again!!
customer_reviews.author: R. Blackstock

customer_reviews.title: Has improved my breathing and sleep.
customer_reviews.text: I was using a 7 inch bed wedge and decided I needed a little more height. This 10 inch wedge is more comfortable and I don't scooch down so much. It is very comfortable and cushiony. My sleep is better and I am more rested and my breathing is better. I have afib and I think this wedge has helped that too.
customer_reviews.author: Horserider

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I'm glad I purchased this. I purchased this based on rec from an influencer. An added bonus is that it stopped me from snoring! I no longer have to use a cpap machine. I also use a different pillow on top of the wedge too (the one that holds your head straight).
customer_reviews.author: cjen

customer_reviews.title: I Slide Down While Sleeping
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is quite nice and is very comfortable, but I slide down while sleeping, and then it becomes uncomfortable. I am a big guy, so others who are not so big may not have this experience, but I will be returning my pillow because it does not help me the way I need it to.
customer_reviews.author: JDRWaco

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t work as wonderful as expected based on other reviews . Kind of awkward. Wanted to ship back but tried charging me shipping back & due to it being memory foam , i couldn’t roll back up the way it came so would’ve needed a huge box
customer_reviews.author: mscarnecchia

customer_reviews.title: Great wedge
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for sitting up in bed or against a wall. I have also used it lying down when I’ve had acid reflux and it perfectly supports my body. I’m 5’7” and 250lbs. The foam is dense enough to support my body but also is really comfortable. I have a double cervical spinal fusion (c5-c6, c6-c7) and sitting in bed was really hurting my neck. This product was the solution! I also bought a lap desk so my computer is elevated and I’m no longer looking down at it, which also helped with the posture issues of sitting in bed with a screen on my lap. I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Marta

customer_reviews.title: Good and helpful
customer_reviews.text: This was a great help after having shoulder surgery. Now I love to use it when watching TV or reading in bed. It is firm.
customer_reviews.author: Ctina

customer_reviews.title: Works but way too firm
customer_reviews.text: This wedge has helped my medical issues. It will s not memory foam--doeant conform to my body when I lay on it. It is very dense regular foam--very very firm. Too firm for side sleeping. I can stand on it and not compress it I'd return it if I could do be a box to fit it. No way to return it in shipping box because it won't compact.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Meh... Pillow case sold separately. I find 2 pillows to be similar support. Also... Think about where you're going to keep this thing. It's big and annoying to have around your bed walking space. UPDATE*** I've had this thing for quite a while now.. despite the thoughts in my initial review where I gave it 1 star, this thing does get used occasionally. so while I don't think it's anything to right home about, it does have some function.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Defina

customer_reviews.title: Loved this pillow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow to help me sleep after I had surgery. I did the job and was very comfortable. It's memory foam, so don't expect a "squishy" pillow. It was supportive, and if I wanted a little extra a fluff, I would just put a down pillow on top of it.
customer_reviews.author: rachelkhays

customer_reviews.title: Double check your size needs
customer_reviews.text: Double check your size needs. This is a very stiff foam, and I thought I could use it for a wedge behind my back and under my knees, but the pitch is too high for my knees.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Tom

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo cloth means Rayon
customer_reviews.text: It's OK but it's dodgy calling Rayon bamboo cloth, since it in no way resembles or reals anything like a natural fiber anymore just because it started out as cellulose pulp. The foam is quite stiff, that might be good or bad depending on your likes. Personally I found the angle to steep for sleeping although my spouse liked it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Arless

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and multipurpose use. My kids take it and lay it in the floor to watch tv or place it at the end of the bed for same purpose. I place it under my legs or behind my back (in the rare change my kids let me use it). Works great
customer_reviews.author: LivingMyBestLife

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful tool
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase! My husband has sleep apnea and snores terribly, but this wedge raises his head enough that it has really cut a lot of the snoring and I am sleeping so much better now.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hooke

customer_reviews.title: Using it right now
customer_reviews.text: This has helped improve my productivity while working from home. Sometimes I am working on my bed, but I would have back pain from poor posture, so I lean this against the wall while I work at a laptop desk. The foam is well built and firm but comfortable. I only wish it came with another cover.
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: it would be perfect. Not the product's fault
customer_reviews.text: Using this for sleep apnea. I got the 10in. I have to sleep with an additional pillow under my head/shoulder (just the wedge makes me sweat), under my bottom (so I don't slid down) and under my knees (also to not slide down). It's a lot of hassle and I usually end up sleeping in the recliner. If my body could just do the wedge, it would be perfect. Not the product's fault, as it does help with my breathing.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen Harris

customer_reviews.title: Good to help with reflux
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this pillow to avoid reflux and it really helps, I am doing better I am still getting use to sleeping in this position but everyday gets better. The quality is good and i will recommend it to anyone looking for reflux relief.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: So far so excellent....!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used this a couple of times so far so I may edit review if things change, however, so far this is very comfy and gives lots of support. There was not an odor when opening and I was able to use first night.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Hoke

customer_reviews.title: you don't to have a medical problem to like this
customer_reviews.text: Have no maladies at the moment but got it for reading & it works quit well for that and, I was surprised to discover, as a sleeping pillow (flipped over), good buy, would suggest they offer a link for pillowcases -- fortunately, scrolling through the q&a's, I found one -- 'cause nobody wants a big white pillow sticking up out of their bed, IMHO, as then folks will think you do have a medical problem!
customer_reviews.author: John T.

customer_reviews.title: 10” size Smells Awful
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 7” wedge of this brand some months ago, encouraged by reviews that said it was odor free & it was indeed without a bad smell. The 10” wedge that I just received DOES smell bad: kind of a chemical/mildew smell. I cannot sleep on something that reeks.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, check your measurements first!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow with a 10-inch rise to use for acid reflux as well as for occasional reading or to put my lower legs onto. It's okay for all of these but not great at any; that is all due to the size for me; I should have bought the next size down. I definitely recommend trying to make a mock-up using your own pillows/boxes to ensure the size will work first. The construction seems fine, and the foam seems to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: tony hatzigiannakis

customer_reviews.title: Critical for recovery
customer_reviews.text: I had cervical spine surgery seven weeks ago. I've had to wear a hard cervical collar 24 hours a day until two days ago. This pillow was the best for providing support in the daytime (vertically) and at night (horizontally). I still use it in the daytime while my muscles adjust to living collar-free.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Too high for me
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this wedge, I needed this wedge. Unfortunately it was great for reading in bed but too high for sleeping. I returned it and got one that was about half the height and that has worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Annie P

customer_reviews.title: Valued sleep aid
customer_reviews.text: The wedge pillow in the 10 inch size is great to sit up in bed. However when you lay down to sleep make sure to have a pillow handy as it is HARD! It is still useful but not without a pillow!
customer_reviews.author: Joann Logsdon

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Uncomfortable to sleep on... kept sliding through out the night and subsequently had neck pains. The 7” might’ve worked better. Returning this package would be too hassling... so now it’s just there...all of $41
customer_reviews.author: Marlzmom

customer_reviews.title: Best Product for Those that Snore or have Sleep Apnea
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, My wife says I don't snore or hold my breath anymore. I wake up relaxed and well rested.
customer_reviews.author: Chip

customer_reviews.title: Had to give away
customer_reviews.text: I read on a blog that if you sleep on this the swelling on your eyes from side and stomach sleeping will be reduced... I tried on my back for two weeks and got a stiff neck...I didn't notice any improvement of the swelling eyes, but sure found using it a a back sleeping pillow really is bad...
customer_reviews.author: Steptyler

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I'm really trying to learn to sleep on my back to help with the appearance of facial /chest wrinkles and indentions. This was highly recommended and I really like it. I sometimes use it with a small pillow and it's very comfortable. Also nice for reading or watching TV in bed.
customer_reviews.author: RunnerGirl

product_meta.title: Brentwood Home Zuma Therapeutic Wedge Pillow, Helps with Sleep & Acid Reflux, 100% Made in USA, CertiPUR-US - Washable Natural Bamboo Cover, 10" x 24" x 24"
product_meta.description: Size:10-InchThe Brentwood Therapeutic Foam Bed Wedge Pillow provides the perfect support to elevate your upper body, legs, or to use as a trunk stabilizer for lying on your side. This high quality product is designed for those suffering from acid reflux, difficulty breathing, poor circulation, hiatal hernias, back, or neck problems. Can be used to elevate your feet or legs. This pillow offers a comfortable, gradual slope and uses gravity to keep reflux down and airways open.
feature_bullets: Provides a healthy more comfortable nights sleep, perfect for watching television on the floor or reading in bed
Comfortable, gradual slope helps ease respiratory problems while reducing neck and shoulder pain.
Helps with acid reflux, snoring, allergies, problem breathing, poor circulation, hiatal hernia, back or neck problems or any other condition which breathing may be impaired in supine position
The design can help with digestion by posturing the torso correctly to produce a positive anti-reflux position or use it to elevate legs to increase circulation
Has a super soft stretch knit bamboo cover that is removable and washable for easy care, 10-inch x 24-inch x 24-inch

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
